revenue_growth.name: Revenue Growth
revenue_growth.description: The percentage increase in revenue from the previous year.

operating_income_growth.name: Operating Income Growth
operating_income_growth.description: The percentage increase in operating income from the previous year.

net_income_growth.name: Net Income Growth
net_income_growth.description: The percentage increase in net income from the previous year.

eps_growth.name: EPS Growth
eps_growth.description: The percentage increase in earnings per share from the previous year.

dividend_growth.name: Dividend Growth
dividend_growth.description: The percentage increase in dividends from the previous year.

roe.name: Return on Equity (ROE)
roe.description: The net income as a percentage of shareholder equity.

roa.name: Return on Assets (ROA)
roa.description: The net income as a percentage of total assets.

fcf_margin.name: Free Cash Flow Margin
fcf_margin.description: The free cash flow as a percentage of revenue.

debt_equity_ratio.name: Debt to Equity Ratio
debt_equity_ratio.description: The total debt as a percentage of shareholder equity.

current_ratio.name: Current Ratio
current_ratio.description: The ratio of current assets to current liabilities.
current_ratio.formula: balance['Total Current Assets'] / balance['Total Current Liabilities']

interest_coverage.name: Interest Coverage
interest_coverage.description: The ratio of operating income to interest expenses.

payout_ratio.name: Payout Ratio
payout_ratio.description: The percentage of earnings paid out as dividends.

price_to_sales.name: Price to Sales Ratio
price_to_sales.description: The ratio of market capitalization to total revenue.

price_to_earnings.name: Price to Earnings Ratio
price_to_earnings.description: The ratio of market capitalization to net income.

price_to_book.name: Price to Book Ratio
price_to_book.description: The ratio of market capitalization to shareholder equity.

ev_to_ebitda.name: EV to EBITDA Ratio
ev_to_ebitda.description: The ratio of enterprise value to EBITDA.

ev_to_sales.name: EV to Sales Ratio
ev_to_sales.description: The ratio of enterprise value to total revenue.

ev_to_fcf.name: EV to FCF Ratio
ev_to_fcf.description: The ratio of enterprise value to free cash flow.

market_cap.name: Market Capitalization
market_cap.description: The total market value of a company's outstanding shares.

enterprise_value.name: Enterprise Value
enterprise_value.description: The total value of a company's outstanding shares and debt.

roic.name: Return on Invested Capital (ROIC)
roic.description: The net operating profit after tax as a percentage of invested capital.
roic.formula: (income['EBIT']*(1 - income['Tax Rate For Calcs'])) / (balance['Total Assets'] - balance['Current Liabilities'] + balance['Current Debt'] + balance['Cash Financial']) * 100

gross_margin.name: Gross Margin
gross_margin.description: The gross profit as a percentage of revenue.

operating_margin.name: Operating Margin
operating_margin.description: The operating income as a percentage of revenue.

net_margin.name: Net Margin
net_margin.description: The net income as a percentage of revenue.

ebitda_margin.name: EBITDA Margin
ebitda_margin.description: The EBITDA as a percentage of revenue.

ebit_margin.name: EBIT Margin
ebit_margin.description: The EBIT as a percentage of revenue.

ebt_margin.name: EBT Margin
ebt_margin.description: The EBT as a percentage of revenue.

tax_rate.name: Tax Rate
tax_rate.description: The percentage of income paid in taxes.

inventory_turnover.name: Inventory Turnover
inventory_turnover.description: The number of times inventory is sold and replaced in a year.

receivables_turnover.name: Receivables Turnover
receivables_turnover.description: The number of times receivables are collected in a year.

payables_turnover.name: Payables Turnover
payables_turnover.description: The number of times payables are paid in a year.
payables_turnover.formula: income['Cost of Goods Sold'] / balance['Accounts Payable']

asset_turnover.name: Asset Turnover
asset_turnover.description: The ratio of revenue to total assets.

financial_leverage.name: Financial Leverage
financial_leverage.description: The ratio of total assets to shareholder equity.

operating_cycle.name: Operating Cycle
operating_cycle.description: The number of days it takes to turn inventory into cash.

cash_conversion_cycle.name: Cash Conversion Cycle
cash_conversion_cycle.description: The number of days it takes to turn inventory and receivables into cash.
cash_conversion_cycle.formula: 365 / ((income['Cost of Goods Sold'] / balance['Inventory']) + (income['Total Revenue'] / balance['Accounts Receivable']))

days_sales_outstanding.name: Days Sales Outstanding
days_sales_outstanding.description: The number of days it takes to collect receivables.

days_inventory.name: Days Inventory
days_inventory.description: The number of days it takes to sell inventory.

days_payable.name: Days Payable
days_payable.description: The number of days it takes to pay payables.

working_capital.name: Working Capital
working_capital.description: The difference between current assets and current liabilities.
working_capital.formula: balance['Total Current Assets'] - balance['Total Current Liabilities']

working_capital_ratio.name: Working Capital Ratio
working_capital_ratio.description: The ratio of current assets to current liabilities.
working_capital_ratio.formula: balance['Total Current Assets'] / balance['Total Current Liabilities']

cash_ratio.name: Cash Ratio
cash_ratio.description: The ratio of cash to current liabilities.
cash_ratio.formula: balance['Cash and Cash Equivalents'] / balance['Total Current Liabilities']

quick_ratio.name: Quick Ratio
quick_ratio.description: The ratio of liquid assets to current liabilities.
quick_ratio.formula: (balance['Total Current Assets'] - balance['Inventory']) / balance['Total Current Liabilities']

cashflow_conversion.name: Cash Flow Conversion
cashflow_conversion.description: The percentage of net income converted to free cash flow.

capex_ratio.name: Capex Ratio
capex_ratio.description: The ratio of capital expenditures to revenue.

dividend_yield.name: Dividend Yield
dividend_yield.description: The percentage of dividends paid to market capitalization.

dividend_payout_ratio.name: Dividend Payout Ratio
dividend_payout_ratio.description: The percentage of earnings paid out as dividends.

dividend_coverage_ratio.name: Dividend Coverage Ratio
dividend_coverage_ratio.description: The ratio of net income to dividends paid.

dividend_growth_rate.name: Dividend Growth Rate
dividend_growth_rate.description: The percentage increase in dividends from the previous year.

dividend_payout_growth_rate.name: Dividend Payout Growth Rate
dividend_payout_growth_rate.description: The percentage increase in dividend payout from the previous year.

dividend_yield_growth_rate.name: Dividend Yield Growth Rate
dividend_yield_growth_rate.description: The percentage increase in dividend yield from the previous year.

net_debt_to_ebitda.name: Net Debt to EBITDA Ratio
net_debt_to_ebitda.description: The ratio of net debt to EBITDA.

net_debt_to_sales.name: Net Debt to Sales Ratio
net_debt_to_sales.description: The ratio of net debt to total revenue.

free_cashflow_to_net_debt.name: Free Cash Flow to Net Debt Ratio
free_cashflow_to_net_debt.description: The ratio of free cash flow to net debt.
free_cashflow_to_net_debt.formula: cashflow['Free Cash Flow'] / (balance['Total Debt'] - balance['Cash Financial'])

free_cashflow_to_sales.name: Free Cash Flow to Sales Ratio
free_cashflow_to_sales.description: The ratio of free cash flow to total revenue.

free_cashflow_margin.name: Free Cash Flow Margin
free_cashflow_margin.description: The free cash flow as a percentage of revenue.

free_cashflow_growth.name: Free Cash Flow Growth
free_cashflow_growth.description: The percentage increase in free cash flow from the previous year.

free_cashflow_yield.name: Free Cash Flow Yield
free_cashflow_yield.description: The percentage of free cash flow to market capitalization.

free_cashflow_payout_ratio.name: Free Cash Flow Payout Ratio
free_cashflow_payout_ratio.description: The percentage of free cash flow paid out as dividends.

free_cashflow_dividend_coverage.name: Free Cash Flow Dividend Coverage
free_cashflow_dividend_coverage.description: The ratio of free cash flow to dividends paid.
